PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS by allowing apprentices in approved training programs to serve only one two-week waiting period within the same apprenticeship program before they are eligible for employment insurance benefits.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0280 Publication Date: 2002-07-31
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS by allowing
apprentices in approved training programs to serve only one two-week
waiting period within the same apprenticeship program before they are
eligible for employment insurance benefits.
